effect.sun_moon: Inflicts regular damage. Raises the user’s Speed by one stage.
effect.ultra_sun_ultra_moon: Inflicts regular damage. Raises the user’s Speed by one stage.
effect.lets_go_pikachu_lets_go_eevee: Inflicts regular damage. Raises the user’s Speed by one stage.

short_effect.sun_moon: Inflicts regular damage. Raises the user’s Speed by one stage.
short_effect.ultra_sun_ultra_moon: Inflicts regular damage. Raises the user’s Speed by one stage.
short_effect.lets_go_pikachu_lets_go_eevee: Inflicts regular damage. Raises the user’s Speed by one stage.

flavor_text.sun_moon: Cloaking itself in flame, the user attacks. Then, building up more power, the user raises its Speed stat.
flavor_text.ultra_sun_ultra_moon: Cloaking itself in flame, the user attacks. Then, building up more power, the user raises its Speed stat.
